function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Poor ventilation in indoor spaces associated with increased transmission of respiratory infections.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of respiratory droplets carrying sars-cov-2 prompted by airflow generated by air-conditioning.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission via central air supply or drainage system in confined spaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Guidelines for air-conditioning and ventilation systems may not adequately address the transmission mechanism of sars-cov-2, leading to ineffective measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission through respiratory droplets and airborne particles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission in specific situations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 in the air and on indoor surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through ventilation ducts","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fecal-oral transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inhalation transmission of sars-cov-2 in crowded indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of guidelines","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deprioritization of hvac measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient outdoor air ventilation in building ventilation systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor air filtration in building ventilation systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation system operation hours","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variable and unpredictable airflow patterns in naturally ventilated buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cross-infection due to the supply of recirculated air in buildings with centralized air-conditioning systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exposure of eyes and skin to uv-c radiation from uvgi lamps","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate control of temperature and humidity in buildings leading to increased transmission of infectious organisms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of infection control strategies in the early stages of building design","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to strictly implement the latest published standards and guidelines by ashrae","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to airborne transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Operating hvac systems as usual during an outbreak","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of air handling units with recirculation and inadequate filtration","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Turning off toilet ventilation systems during the outbreak","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 stability at different temperatures and humidity levels","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of filters and air cleaning methods","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of high relative humidity and low humidity levels","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Leakages in heat recovery equipment leading to higher air leakage rates","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of respiratory protection during filter replacement and maintenance work","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Open windows in toilets leading to improper pressure differentials and potential spread of airborne contaminants","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and outdoor air circulation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of in-duct uv-c devices and ozone-emitting devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improper operation of hvac systems and maintenance of pressure differentials","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continuous operation of toilet exhaust system","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closing the toilet window to maintain negative pressure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temperature and humidity control","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation in rooms with centralized outdoor air systems and no floor-centralized exhaust system","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in rooms without openable exterior windows and exhaust ventilation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Toilet lid being left open during flushing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation leading to poor air quality and potential disease spread.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ineffective or inappropriate filtration and cleaning methods in hvac systems.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate heat recovery equipment leading to improper air pressure differentials and ventilation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pressure differentials between zones not maintained as per guidelines, leading to potential cross-contamination of air","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective maintenance of hvac systems leading to poor air quality and potential transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective water system maintenance leading to potential contamination and transmission of waterborne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of airborne virus transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of agreement on the effectiveness of ventilation in reducing the risk of infection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent recommendations for the operation of air-conditioning systems and air cleaners","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate use of air cleaners and filters leading to ineffective control of virus spread","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
